description:
Ashibe and his family go to the summer festival and Ma remembers how different Ashibe is compared to last year.
Ashibe was reluctant to go to the festival wearing a summer kimono, but Suago’s already waiting for him.
No matter what Ma and Pa say, Ashibe does not want to see Sugao wearing a kimono...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アシベとスガオの夏祭り
